Uses of Package
de.mrapp.android.preference.activity

  • Packages that use de.mrapp.android.preference.activity 
    Package Description
    de.mrapp.android.preference.activity  
    de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter  
    de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.parser  
  • Classes in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity used by de.mrapp.android.preference.activity 
    Class and Description
    PreferenceFragment
    A fragment, which allows to show multiple preferences.
    PreferenceHeader
    A navigation item, which categorizes multiple preferences.
    RestoreDefaultsListener
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when the default values of the preferences, which belong to a PreferenceFragment, should be restored.
    WizardListener
    Defines the interface a class, which should be notified when the user navigates within a PreferenceActivity, which is used as wizard, by using its next-, back- and finish-button.
  • Classes in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity used by de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter 
    Class and Description
    PreferenceHeader
    A navigation item, which categorizes multiple preferences.
    PreferenceHeaderDecorator
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be able to modify the visualization of preference headers, must implement.
  • Classes in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity used by de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.parser 
    Class and Description
    PreferenceHeader
    A navigation item, which categorizes multiple preferences.
